xt:extension.xt:author: Dartmouth College Library
xt:extension.xt:name: MODS (Metadata Object Description Schema)

xt:description.p: The Dartmouth College Library's local implementation of MODS, the Metadata Object Description Schema.

ul.li: "MODS-to-MARCXML" transformation enhanced to support 1st indicator "0" in personal name headings, multiple 041 language codes, creation of 536 and 388 notes.
Update Winter Carnival Poster and Item templates.
